info.name: Attachment & Video Summary API
info.description:
API for summarizing attachments and videos using OpenRouter and Gemini.

## Available Endpoints:
- **Extract** - Extract content from documents
- **Summarize** - Generate summaries from documents and videos
- **Models** - List available models
- **Health** - Health check

## Version: 2.4.0

request.description: Health check endpoint to verify the API is running.

item.name: Extract

request.description:
## Extract content using Open Source Libraries

Extracts text using:
- **PDF** → PyPDF2
- **DOCX** → python-docx
- **TXT** → Built-in Python

No AI model is used. Pure library extraction.

formdata.description: Document file (PDF only for model extraction)

request.description:
## Extract content using AI Model

Passes the PDF directly to the AI model for extraction.

### Supported Models:
- `gpt-4o` - OpenAI (default, best for PDFs)
- `gemini-2.5-pro` - Google Gemini

### How it works:
1. PDF is converted to base64
2. Sent directly to the model
3. Model extracts and returns the text

**Note:** Only PDF files are supported for model extraction.

item.description: Extract content from documents using open source libraries or AI models

formdata.description: First document file (PDF, TXT, or DOCX)

Third document file (PDF, TXT, or DOCX)

request.description:
## Summarize multiple attachment files (Batch)

Accepts multiple files (PDF, TXT, or DOCX) and returns summaries for each.

### Request:
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data
- Field: `files` (multiple files with same key name)

### Model: GPT-4o via OpenRouter

response.name: Success

request.description:
## Summarize multiple documents from URLs (Batch)

Accepts a simple array of URLs pointing to PDF, TXT, or DOCX files.
Downloads each file, extracts content, and generates summaries using GPT-4o.

### Request Body:
```json
[
    "https://example.com/doc1.pdf",
    "https://example.com/doc2.pdf",
    "https://example.com/doc3.pdf"
]
```

### Model: GPT-4o via OpenRouter

response.name: Success

request.description:
## Summarize videos from URLs

Accepts a list of video URLs, downloads them, uploads to Gemini File API, and generates summaries.

### Request Body:
```json
[
    "https://example.com/video1.mp4",
    "https://example.com/video2.mp4"
]
```

### Model: Gemini 2.0 Flash

**Note:** Requires direct video URLs (not Loom share pages). Use the Video File endpoint for local files.

response.name: Success

formdata.description: Video file (MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WEBM, FLV, WMV)

request.description:
## Summarize uploaded video file using Gemini 2.5 Pro

Upload a video file directly and get a comprehensive summary using Google Gemini 2.5 Pro.

### Supported Video Types:
- MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WEBM, FLV, WMV, M4V

### Request:
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data
- Field: `file` (video file)

### Model: Gemini 2.5 Pro

### How it works:
1. Video is uploaded to Gemini File API
2. Gemini 2.5 Pro analyzes the video content
3. Returns detailed summary with overview, topics, key points, and takeaways

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "summary": "Overview:
This video demonstrates...

Main Topics:
- Topic 1: Description
- Topic 2: Description

Key Points:

- Important point 2
- Important point 3

People/Speakers:
- Speaker name and their main points

Visual Content:
- Description of on-screen content

Action Items/Takeaways:
- Takeaway 1
- Takeaway 2",
    "filename": "sample.mp4"
}
